<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Healing Transformation](/Feats.aspx?ID=4742) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=583" />
<trait label="Spellshape" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=513" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 133 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

You can take advantage of shapechanging magic to close wounds and patch injuries. If your next action is to cast a noncantrip polymorph spell that targets only one creature, your polymorph spell also restores 1d6 Hit Points per spell rank to that creature. This is a healing effect.

<title level="2">Healing Transformation leads to...</title>
[Cleansing Transformation](/Feats.aspx?ID=5406)
name: Healing Transformation
